nodes.text: 2018 Topps Countdown to Solo: A Star Wars Story

2018 Topps Countdown to Solo: A Star Wars Story was a trading card set released by The Topps Company, Inc. in 2018 to coincide with the release of the film Solo: A Star Wars Story. As indicated by the name, a card is released during the days counting down for the movie, with 25 cards being planned for release, one each weekday.
